recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients in crockpot. Cover and cook on high for 2-3 hours or on low for 4-6 hours, or until chicken is cooked through and shreds easily with a fork.
Remove the chicken from the slow cooker, leaving the broth in the pot. Shred. Stir in 1/2 cup of broth from the pot from flavor and moisture.
Mix in 1/4 cup of the sauce with the cooked chicken, and a 1/4 cup of the cheese. Sprinkle with a little salt. Set aside.
